title: Waiting Is Not An Option in The Cannabis Industry With Yona Levy
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Yona Levy, CEO of Alvit Pharma and Director of Tefen Management Consulting, discusses the global potential in the cannabis market, Israel's role in the cannabis industry, the importance of lobbyists and doctors and what will drive global deregulation. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
